job_title: Anonymous Employee in Banani Model Town
pros: Fantastic company to work for, great staff and service users. There are lots of opportunities to develop your career. Overall they are very supporting and I am proud to work at Jubilee.
cons: It can be challenging but rewarding, however that is part of the job!

pros:
Great team.
Amazing management.
Upbeat and fast paced!
No day is the same you never get bored! 
Fun atmosphere. 
The company fully support your learning and development. 
Really supportive.
cons: None, I loved everything about working for jubilee house.
